content.p: A cancellation/pro-rota refund can be issued: Alumni & Associate, UoN Casual Staff, David Ross Sports Village and Sutton Bonington Public members have the opportunity to freeze membership for up to three months. During this time an active Direct Debit is required, however no fees will be taken. To submit a request to freeze your membership please contact our Memberships Officer. A membership freeze can only be activated from the 1st of each month. If you wish to freeze for the forthcoming month pleasure ensure you contact the team at the latest of the 24th of each month, The UoN sport and fitness membership is a continuous membership agreement and fees shall be collected on the 1st of each month via direct debit. This is a flexible membership which can be cancelled any time by providing one full calendar monthsâ€™ notice. For example, if wishing to cancel your membership in August, a cancellation request is required by 31 July (one month previous). Please note: Please note, membership refund requests will be considered within 7 working days. David Ross Sports Village University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0)115 74 87000 email: sport@nottingham.ac.uk
